data.sentence: The word أَوْ comes from the root ا و and is associated with the meanings: or
The word كَالُوهُمْ comes from the root ك ي ل and is associated with the meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Lam) To measure, weigh, compare.
The word وَزَنُوهُمْ comes from the root و ز ن and is associated with the meanings: to weigh/judge/measure.

data.meanings: To suffer loss or diminution, to be deceived/cheated/beguiled/circumvented, to err/go astray/deviate from/miss the right way, to perish or die, make a thing defective or deficient, destroy or cause to perish, remove/alienate/estrange someone, to be treacherous/ignoble/mean, to be unfaithful, ungenerous, small/little/weak (among mankind), refuse invitation from another.
data.sentence: The word يُخْسِرُونَ comes from the root خ س ر and is associated with the meanings: To suffer loss or diminution, to be deceived/cheated/beguiled/circumvented, to err/go astray/deviate from/miss the right way, to perish or die, make a thing defective or deficient, destroy or cause to perish, remove/alienate/estrange someone, to be treacherous/ignoble/mean, to be unfaithful, ungenerous, small/little/weak (among mankind), refuse invitation from another.
